title: Revit BIM Families Expert – Full-Time Remote
job_overview:
We’re looking for a Revit BIM Families Expert to join our international team at RD Studio. Your role will focus on planning, reviewing, and managing professional Revit family content.

Responsibilities:
 • Research and plan new Revit content collections
 • Write PRDs and briefs for our modeling team
 • Review families for accuracy, naming, performance, and standards compliance
 • Organize and maintain tasks using Notion and Asana
 • Help prepare release documentation, tags, and file structure

Requirements:
 • Advanced Revit family modeling experience (shared parameters, nested families, visibility settings)
 • Strong understanding of BIM workflows and standards
 • Excellent written English for documentation
 • Organized, detail-oriented, and independent
 • Bonus: Familiarity with Notion or Asana

To Apply:
Send the following:
 1. Short intro about your Revit experience
 2. Sample families you’ve modeled - the more complex the better
 3. 2–3 sentences on how you’d organize a pack of 20 Revit furniture families

Salary: Starting from $1,200/month
Schedule: Full time, 40 hours/week, remote
